answers.answer: If he was sick maybe get his enzyme count done.

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!If the fever is not too high and comes in the evening only, then it could be due to anemia, diabetes, hypothyroid states, dehydration, overwork, stress and fatigue. It is also seen in diseases like tuberculosis.Do discuss this with his doctor and get these conditions ruled out. Take care!

question: My son ,age 30 is having fever in the night only for the past 15 days. Blood tests show no infections or other suspected deceases. May I know ,what is the cause of this fever symptom ?
